title: Organizational Development Practical Skill Enhancement: Technology-Enhanced Inquiry-Based Science Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for utilizing digital tools when defining scientific problems
Learners can share records of the inquiry process on a collaborative platform and incorporate peer feedback
Learners can analyze data collected via mobile devices to create scientific experiment reports
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
